title: Radio
description: A control that allows users to select only one option from a set.

checked.description: Specifies whether this radio button is the currently-selected one in its group. Maps to the native checked attribute.

disabled.description: If true, this radio button cannot be selected or de-selected. Maps to the native disabled attribute.

global.description: If true, this radio button will use a global, document-level scope for its selection group rather than its local shadow root.

reducedTouchTarget.description: When true, the radio removes touch target that extends beyond visual boundary of the component. Set to false by default to meet Material accessibility guidelines.

name.description: Name of the input for form submission, and identifier for the selection group. Only one radio button can be checked for a given selection group. Maps to the native name attribute.

value.description: Value of the input for form submission. Maps to the native value attribute.
